titles.title: A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of a Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
A resolution notifying the President of the United States of the election of a Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: Notifies the President of the election of the Honorable Michael C. Stenger as Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
